alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 8:59PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero for the Wasatch Back, 10 below zero for Weber and Davis County, near 0 Salt Lake and Utah County. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An unusual combination of elevated winds and very cold temperatures will bring near to below 0 wind chills to the Wasatch Front.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
